Job Description

The IT Corporate Finance Reporting team is seeking an OFSAA (Oracle Financial Services Analytical Applications) Developer/SME for its internal Profit Plus application. The Profit Plus application calculates profitability by account which can be rolled up by product, customer and organization to provide data for financial and risk reporting.
